nodes.text: Ahoy, Captain O'Conner! You make a bonny fine pirate, me boyo.
Look! This must be the Death Wall's Gate mentioned on my map!
If we can find the way to open this gate, we should be able to get the pirate treasure.
Did you find the Tattooed Skull?
I've got the Tattooed Skull right here!
I've also got the Skeleton Key and the Captain's Hat.
So that's why I couldn't get them... You sneaky Rogue, you.
That means we should have everything we need to open this gate.
Well, I got the Captain's Skeleton Key... and the Captain's Hat. Here - take the hat - it may come in handy later. Pirate Zombies are notorious suckers for authority.
That means we should have everything we need to open this gate.

nodes.message: So Katie got the skull instead.
nodes.commentor: Shawn didn't get the skull in time.

nodes.text: I'm sorry, Katie. I couldn't find a tattooed skull anywhere.
But I did manage to get the Pirate Captain's hat and key!
At least I managed to get the skeleton key.
Yeah, I kind of figured that out. When you took so long getting back here, I figured you weren't going to show up at all, so I found the tattooed skull myself.
Now all we have to do is figure out how to open up this gate.
I got the key!
Wait... you said that you were getting the Tattooed Skull, but you got the key instead?
It's great you got the Captain's key, but we still need to find the Tattooed Skull. I'll meet you back here when you get it.
You told me that you were going to get the skull. I'll meet you back here when you get it. We can't get through this gate without it.
Did you get the Captain's Key?
Yes! I got the Captain's Key from the Zombie Pirates... and I got the Captain's hat, too.
Shawn, that's awesome. You're the best friend I've ever had.
I also got the Tattooed Skull while I was at it.
So that's why I couldn't get them... You sneaky Rogue, you.
That means we should have everything we need to open this gate.
So now that you found the Tattooed Skull and the Captain's Key, we should be able to open this gate!
Well, I got the Tattooed Skull. That means we should have everything we need to open this gate.
Now all we have to do is figure out how to open up this gate.

nodes.message: So Katie got the key instead.
nodes.commentor: Shawn didn't get the key in time.

nodes.text: I'm sorry. I just couldn't get the skeleton key.
But while I was looking for it, I found the tattooed skull!
At least I managed to find the tattooed skull.
Yeah, I kind of figured that out. When you took so long getting back here, and I couldn't find the tattooed, I figured you weren't going to show up at all.
But it wasn't a big deal. I just risked my life and Lyra in a deadly game of Poobah against the Zombie Pirate Captain. I won his hat and the key for myself.
Here, you take the hat. You might need it later. Pirate Zombies are notorious suckers for authority.
Now all we have to do is figure out how to open up this gate.
No, but I got the Tattooed Skull!
Well, that's a good start, but we can't open this gate without the key. You'll have to find a way to get it from the Zombie Pirate Captain Bronson.
I'll meet you back here.
You told me that you would get the key from the Zombie Pirate Captain. I'll meet you back here when you get it.
I haven't even found anyone who looks like a Zombie Pirate Captain!
We'll have to keep looking for him. He must be somewhere in the Sea Caves!
I found the pirate lair, but it's full of bloodthirsty Zombie Pirates! There's no way I can get past them to the Captain.
Well, if you can't figure out how to sneak past them, mabe you can lure them away somehow.
It's worth a try. I'll get past them somehow.
The only way to get that key is to beat the Zombie Captain at Poobah, but I'm too broke to even start the game.
That's all? Once we have the treasure, we'll be rich! Here, I'll stake you enough Lyra for the game.
The Zombie Pirate Captain won't even deal with me unless I bring him something that will protect him from Pandas. I think he's putting me on!
I have everything I need to get the Captain's Key; I'll be on my way!
